mapper.select: SELECT sm.id, sm.parent_id, sr.role_sign as name, sm.url, sm.type, sm.icon, sm.order_num, sm.gmt_create, sm.gmt_modified FROM zyd_cloud.sys_menu AS sm INNER JOIN zyd_cloud.sys_role_menu AS srm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id INNER JOIN zyd_cloud.sys_role AS sr ON srm.role_id = sr.id

SELECT p.menu_id, p.parent_id, p.`name`, p.url, p.type, p.icon, p.order_num, p.gmt_create, p.gmt_modified FROM zyd_cloud.sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN zyd_cloud.sys_user_role AS sru ON u.user_id = sru.user_id LEFT JOIN zyd_cloud.sys_role AS r ON sru.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN zyd_cloud.sys_role_menu AS spr ON spr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN zyd_cloud.sys_menu AS p ON p.menu_id = spr.menu_id WHERE u.user_id = #{value}
